subject: RE: Webull UK (New ISA Product) 2026 UPDATE
body:
Hi Johnson,

Thanks for your message about the ISA launch — and for your persistence over the past few months! I apologise for not getting back sooner.

I've been doing a lot of work behind the scenes building out my website and content strategy, and I think the timing is now right to explore working together properly.

Since you first reached out, here's where things stand:

- YouTube: 66,400+ subscribers, 4.5 million total views across 335 videos
- Top video: 826,000+ views
- Website: socialtradingvlog.com — now features interactive comparison tools, educational guides, and SEO-optimised content
- Multi-language: full site in 6 languages (English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Arabic)
- I've just built an interactive platform comparison tool where I compare trading platforms side by side

Your ISA launch timing is perfect — my UK audience will be looking at ISA options as the new tax year approaches.

I'd be very interested in discussing:

1. Adding Webull UK to my platform comparison tool (socialtradingvlog.com/calculators/compare-platforms/) — this gets continuous organic search traffic
2. A dedicated Webull UK review and comparison article
3. Featuring Webull in relevant YouTube videos

In terms of the partnership model, I'd like to understand:
- What CPA or revenue share rates you offer for content creators in my size bracket
- Whether there's a premium or long-term partner programme (you mentioned a 'customised collaboration model' in a previous email)
- What the commission structure looks like for ISA account signups specifically

I'm based in Malta and flexible on call times. Happy to discuss further.

Best regards,
Tom West
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://www.youtube.com/@SocialTradingVlog
